title: Exquisite Floral Diamond Haaram with Rice Pearl Accents
materials: meticulously set with sparkling Diamonds. Features Pink tourmaline accents
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Haaram, this piece showcases a breathtaking floral design. Each diamond is expertly pave-set to maximize brilliance. The floral vines are adorned with freshwater Rice Pearls, adding a touch of classic elegance. The central pendant features a flower design, enhanced by Diamonds and a Pink Tourmaline stone.
colors: Primarily a warm gold tone accented by the brilliant white of the diamonds
the soft sheen of the rice pearls
and pops of pink and navy from the Tourmaline and other gemstone accents.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. A stunning choice for modern brides seeking a touch of tradition.
description: This Diamond Haaram blends contemporary design with classic elegance. The meticulous craftsmanship, the use of high-quality diamonds, and the delicate rice pearl accents create a timeless piece that will be treasured for generations. It is a modern heirloom that reflects impeccable taste.
